name: Monster Trainer RL
description:
Welcome to the Tokan region!

You are a pocket-monster trainer, your goal is to become the Monster Master by defeating the 8 gym leaders of Tokan.

In order to do so, you’ll have to travel the land looking for powerful pocket monsters, capture and train them to become stronger.

Pick your starting monster and travel the world, a new adventure awaits you every time!

Check out the full story of development here.
